video_info.title: Horde on a Budget: Cost-Effective Infrastructure for Small Teams | Unreal Fest Bali 2025
video_info.description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Bali 2025, Ash Sewell explores how a small team at S1T2 leverages Horde for their CI/CD pipeline. 

Ash breaks down S1T2â€™s hybrid approach of hosting the Horde server on AWS while running build agents on-premises; shares some tips on choosing hardware for build agents; and discusses the ways the studio reduced costs.  

Additionally, Ash covers practical ways to use and configure Horde, like integrating Unreal Game Sync, and discusses the pros and cons for
